name: Void Talk
description:
Void Talk is a short visual novel about a therapist AI, designed to provide talk therapy for astronauts on long space voyages.

Talk to characters, find out more about them, offer them advice, and maybe call them out when they lie to you--but be careful! If you accuse someone of lying when they're telling the truth, or if you don't have adequate proof, your clients will lose trust in you and will tell you even less.

This is a short prequel to a larger project that is still in the planning stages. In this game you can only provide therapy for one character, Gema Waterstone, a Junior Medical Officer aboard the S.S. Vision.
